name: Hampshire Hotel - Noordwijk Hof van Holland

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excellent, quiet location in old Noordwijk and with own car park at rear. First rate, helpful staff especially receptionists.
reviews.title: Excellent location - Pricy restaurant

reviews.text: Establishment is really a restaurant with rooms. We found that the a la carte dinner was too expensive for regular dining - a typical dinner for two with a modest wine and coffee was approx. Euros 140. These prices are really those of Michelin starred restaurants. The hotel should offer a table d'hote menu for hotel guests!
reviews.title: Quiet Stay in Old Dutch Town
Comfort In Noordwijk
reviews.text: For really good simple dining/snacking we strongly recommend nearby Hoek's Vis ( Hoek's Fish ), just the other side of the church situated in front of the Hof van Holland. Spotlessly clean. All types of excellent fresh fish are available and cooked to order - Euros 7 for two!!
